product_name: Platypus Big Zip LP Reservoir - 1.5 Liter
long_description: Stay hydrated on the trail or during a long bike ride with the simple, secure Big Zip LP 1.5-Liter Reservoir from Platypus. Its streamlined design slides easily into your pack for on-the-go sipping. Widemouth opening with Slidelock(TM) closure is easy to fill and locks securely. Low-profile design rides flat in your pack. BPA-free polyethylene with silver-ion antimicrobial finish offers clean, taste-free drinking. Quick-release hose and shutoff valve make drinking and refilling easy.
short_description: Stay hydrated on the trail or during a long bike ride with the simple, secure Big Zip LP 1.5-Liter Reservoir from Platypus. Its streamlined design slides easily into your pack for on-the-go sipping.
